title: Madoff: The Monster of Wall Street
overview: Madoff: The Monster of Wall Street is a docuseries that follows the rise and fall of financier Bernie Madoff, who orchestrated one of the biggest Ponzi schemes in Wall Street history. With an innovative visual approach, the four-part edge-of-your-seat financial thriller reveals the truth behind Bernie Madoff's infamous multibillion-dollar global Ponzi scheme and the ways in which a willfully blind financial system allowed it to flourish for decades.
